snippet: Bargaining under threat is no way to determine the country’s long-term economic future.
abstract: Editorial warns Republicans that budget negotiations under threat of economic calamity is untenable; calls for a clean continuing resolution to fund the government and an unconditional increase in the debt limit; urges Republicans and Democrats to join together to force a vote if Speaker John Boehner continues to refuse to put those measures on the House floor.
lead_paragraph: Bargaining under threat is no way to determine the country’s long-term economic future.

headline.main: First End the Crisis, Then Talk
headline.print_headline: First End the Crisis, Then Talk
